title: Djinn

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose up to one non-Coven player at night. They win the game immediately. You may only use this ability thrice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you have the Necronomicon, you have infinite charges and may choose to remove your target from the game as well.
- Redirect immune

desc:
Post 125
*Congrats on winning a free victory giveaway! We'll just need your credit card number, the expiration date, and the three digits on the back.*
